name: Marcelo Esparza
aboutMe: I am a results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 7 years of experience building scalable web applications and delivering software solutions. My expertise lies in JavaScript and its ecosystem, with a strong focus on React.js for creating responsive and maintainable web applications. I am also experienced with Vue.js and backend technologies like Node.js and TypeScript. I thrive in agile environments, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, and continuously adopting emerging technologies. With a full-stack perspective, I ensure seamless and impactful digital experiences from concept to deployment.
